info.name: Youtube My Theme+
info.description: 🛈 still on development 🛈 Set to dark theme if your using a dark background This style let you customized both dark and light youtube theme. HOW TO INSTALL AND CUSTOMIZE THIS STYLE?? 👉Using Stylish 👉Using Stylus Features: Custom Layout Color Custom Background Image and Color Custom Font (woff, woff2 font file) Change Videos Per Row You can add custom name or text next to your avatar Support my work via PayPal 😉
